description: A dying community in rural Arkansas experiences strange occurrences and deaths shortly after a new family moves into town.

title: Maniac
description: Two couples goes missing.

title: Out of Time
description: A brutal child abuse turned homicide case puts Forensic Investigator Jade MacNeil in the center of The God's Eye Project, a technology that taps into the very fabric of time and forces we don't understand in order to uncover the facts. But what Jade MacNeil discovers is a shocking truth about herself that threatens to shatter everything she thought she knew.

title: Road Hell
description: When a horrific accident forces a deeply dysfunctional couple to check into a decrepit motel, a lecherous and deranged desk clerk arranges for them to witness three unholy visions of the macabre. But when cautionary tales of bloodlust, deadly creatures and a world filled with the undead don't faze these two narcissists, stronger measures are right at hand.

title: In Medias Res
description: On a desolate beach, under a clement sky - Satan shares his poem with God.

title: Planned Obsolescence
description: The only thing standing in perfection's way is what it has become.

title: I trabocchetti del Bandino
description: Florentia 1376. In the small village of Bandino, near the monastery of Paradiso, sexual relations take place between friars and nuns. Over time, some nuns become pregnant. Meanwhile, the Florentine nobleman Antonio Alberti, having escaped the plague, becomes the new owner of Paradise and comes to live there, unaware of everything.

title: Loyalty
description: Four low level criminals are given a last chance to redeem themselves and settle old debts to the mob by taking an seemingly simple assignment: keep watch on a captive rival mob boss for 24 hours.

title: The Classic Sci-Fi Ultimate Collection: Volume 2
description: Five classic science fiction movies on this direct to DVD set.

title: 30 días antes
description: A young Spanish bank employee discovers by chance that the validity of the world economic system will not exceed thirty days. In love with a young Argentine girl, he travels to the Andean country with the aim of saving her from the hecatomb, but the impossibility of telling her what is going to happen complicates everything during the month he has to elaborate his escape plan.

title: No Evil
description: Three strangers meet at a bus stop, fall unconscious, and wake up in a basement where they try to come to grips with their situation and each other.

title: Iron Curtain
description: Anthony, a mute, starts experiencing the supernatural. Trapped in his own silent world, he is helplessly toyed with and haunted by unexplainable entities.

title: Knock Knock Killers
description: A prostitute gets involved with a serial killer.

title: Thaw
description: Both Samuel and Tom are trying to quit their criminal backgrounds and make a fresh start. Their motives differ, but they have got one aim in common: A final masterstroke at the expense of their warring gangs is supposed to pave the way. What follows is the story of two driven men, trapped in a downward spiral of despair and powerlessness.

title: Final Destination 5: Visual Effects of Death - Collapsing Bridge
description: A behind the scenes split-screen look at the making of the collapsing bridge scene in Final Destination 5 including green screen footage.

title: Evil Vid 4: Rebirth
description: December 29, 2032. A week passed after the war with the spacecraft. Funeral Novikov Schaschakina, Opornikovoy. Tim Scarlett suddenly finds - Demon species - LIVE. And he think: "What if you try to bring back to life Novikova?" What he eventually succeeds.. Now Novikov come to grips with the Demon, from which the fate of the country depends.

title: Hostile Denial
description: Mike, a highly decorated police detective, was never good at balancing his professional life with his family life. No matter his love for his wife and young son, his actions only drove a wedge into his relationships. After losing his job and his marriage...evidence arises that Mike may be involved in a series of violent murders. With his former partner, Bill, who was also his best friend, hot on his trail...Mike tries to put together the broken pieces of his life. As the clues unfold...Mike becomes more uncertain of his own innocence...is he, or is he not responsible for these brutal killings? And at what lengths will he go to to find out?

title: Deceived
description: After a man is accused of murdering his ex wife and all the evidence is against him, a woman enters his life that he can't seem to get off his mind. Nothing seems right and now he must try to find out why he is being blamed for the crime he didn't commit and find out who is truly behind it and why.

title: The Deadly Game
description: A thrilling drama involving a love triangle between a biracial couple and their hired help! As the drama unfolds it is revealed that the couple married each other for very different reasons, one for love and the other for wealth. Life is perfect for the power couple and their beautiful daughter Belle until one day there is a discovery of betrayal that turns their marriage into a real life drama involving sex, lies, video tapes and seduction!!!

title: Zaharu
description: Hussain (Ali Cezan) is an interior designer who lives in Male' with his wife and daughter. He was leading and happy and peaceful life until he meets Shaheen (Sheila Najeeb), a long lost friend. While his wife, Ainthu (Niuma Mohamed), and daughter, Sumakko (Aflaaz Faisal) are out of Male on a short holiday, Hussain has a short affair with Shaheen. Though he wanted to end the fling, she begins clinging to him and eventually he becomes her obsession.

title: Echo
description: The life of a young man is threatened by a masked individual in the middle of the California desert.

title: What Lurks Inside
description: The documentation of two young lovers who move into a new home. After a series of strange and unexplained occurrences, the young couple begin to believe they are not alone.

title: The Patient
description: A psychiatrist loses her mind after she got affected by a delusional patient?

title: Oscar
description: When popular and carefree teenager Oscar Nolan discovers someone is stalking him his perfect life is ripped apart.

title: Tin God
description: Ethan is a young man searching for meaning in life and he thinks he has found what he is looking for in the new girl, Sasha. But Sasha has a dark side that will be his undoing.

title: Sin-City
description: Sin city is a story about two police men, Aulad and Iqbal. Aulad is a new police officer but his job is not permanent yet. On the other hand Iqbal has transferred recently to a new police station but his wife and daughter couldn't come with him because of his daughter's school timing. Where Aulad is trying to make his position permanent because he had to give bribes by selling his father's wealth to get this job, Iqbal is trying to get settled here and join his daughter's birthday party back his original house. Though their perspective is very different but at a certain point they understand that they have a core similarity in ethical value. And they realize that things only because of Sin-city.

title: Bad Girl
description: A mysterious little girl lures people deep in the forest to their doom.

title: Haunted Red
description: This film is about a man obsessed with his wife's red hair.

title: Intrusion
description: Five years ago, Ashley Donigan moved across the country after her fiance took a new job. Days later, her body was found in her new home. Years after being declared a cold case, officials received chilling new evidence to reopen the investigation: actual video of Ashley's final days alive. Some of the video Ashely shot herself, and some she had no idea was ever recorded.

title: It Followed Me Too
description: All she wants is an answer.

title: Happy Hour
description: Dave, is having a dream and wakes up not having any recollection of the past few hours. What happens next is what terror is about.

title: Loser
description: In this gritty look at post-traumatic stress syndrome, an Iraqi war veteran succumbs to his disenchantment with his country while having a paint ball fight with a group of kids.

title: A Series of Strange Occurrences
description: Three friends meet in a park to discuss the previous night's events involving Silent Ed, the strangest boy in town, and the sweetest girl in town called Katie. Rumors and gossip abound over an incident that may have occurred between the two, as told in differing points-of-view and flashbacks.

title: Lamplight
description: Lamplight is the story of a young writer struggling to finish a book in time to meet his first deadline. During the process he's haunted by memories of his lonely childhood and abusive single mother. We learn of his internal turmoil that is only being compounded by a broken heart from a recently lost love. His long time girlfriend left him over his writing (lack of success, time away from her, etc.)The subject matter that the writer is tackling pushes his fragile emotional state over the edge causing him to act out in drastic and self destructive ways.

title: Die Muse
description: A young woman awakes in a cell in a basement. A man introduces himself to her: He is a writer and needs her as an inspiration for his new book. He forcibly tries to convince her to stay and help him. A cruel power game develops between the two of them.

title: Terror of the Killer Carnivorous Coat
description: A group of friends struggle for survival as they are faced with the ancient, demonic evil of - the killer carnivorous coat.

title: Hilltop Cemetery
description: When grandfather Billie died, the only thing left to his grandsons, Josh and Conner, was the responsibility of taking care of Hilltop Cemetery for a few days. Could this be a few days of fun or ...

title: Angel of Shavano
description: High in the Rocky Mountains, a young man takes a relic from a Colorado gold mine, awakening the spirit of a Native American princess. Haunted by nightmares and the murder of his mother, young Micah struggles to survive while being hunted by an unrelenting ghost, the Angel of Shavano, who seeks the return of her stolen treasure. 22 years later, Micah has found temporary refuge at a church in Montana, but he is soon forced to return to Colorado, where he must confront his past, his conscience, and an angry ghost who will stop at nothing to protect the treasure of her people for eternity.

title: The Downfall of Ryder
description: A modern retelling of William Shakespeare's Hamlet, The Downfall of Ryder revisits the classic story of revenge. The ghost of the recently deceased Grayson appears to his son, Ryder, to reveal the truth about his passing. Ryder attempts to avenge his father's death but risks those he loves and his own sanity. He turns on his mother, Carys, and her new husband, his uncle, Ronan. Ryder struggles to achieve his retribution while destroying his relationship with Iris. Follow Ryder as he tragically spirals out of control...

title: Ekho
description: A psychological horror/thriller short film experiment in narrative and visual deception that challenges traditional film construction by exploring both internal and external points of view. The audience interprets on-screen events through juxtaposition of images whilst presented with a deconstructed narrative.

title: Retributive Justice
description: A young man is convinced that his friend's suicide is linked to her expulsion from high school. He kidnaps the teachers involved in his friend's expulsion, and puts them on trial in his suburban home. But how far will his conviction take him?

title: Stand By
description: Corruption, favoritism and nepotism threaten and endanger the career and life of an aspiring football player.

title: Adriane's Castle
description: Adriane buys a dress and necklace at a flee market. Little does she know the purchases include pieces of a rare diamond, leading to a tale of murder, mistaken identity, and a castle, when three jewel thieves try to steal the diamonds back.

title: Crockdale
description: CROCKDALE tells the story of a week in the life of witty teen Sarah Fiction, the people close to her, and the residents of West Crockdale. Children have been disappearing for months, leaving no clues and spinning the small community of West Crockdale into confusion. The Police's only lead is Sarah's late Father, whom passed away 7 years ago. Welcome to CROCKDALE.

title: X Marks the Spot
description: Abigail is obsessed with her Friend Tracker application. She checks in every time she stops somewhere. Her roommate Chloe thinks it's too much disclosure and Abigail is putting herself at risk for a stalker. What neither of them know is that Patrick has been watching and waiting and now he's ready to get what he wants and he's going to know right where to find it.

title: The Program
description: Can someone who has no soul, regain their humanity? A rogue group of vampires fight to regain their humanity by using their powers for good instead of evil, ultimately creating a war between good and bad.

title: The Time of Death
description: Ryoko and her husband are a Tokyo couple in a loveless marriage that is on the verge of being turned upside down. Ryoko has developed a deep resentment after years of her husband's selfish behavior and is desperate for a way out. She begins to harbor deadly designs against him. On this particular day, Ryoko has a sudden and fiery love affair with Satoru. He has been pulled into Ryoko's cold machinations, a plan that could wreck both of their lives. Guilty love gives way to panic and then outright conflict, followed by chaos and confusion,yet the film preserves its sense of humor all along. A common thread of true relationship weaves its way through the story, tying together the tension of the disparate scenes.

title: Ayuda
description: Marilyn is found dead one morning on her own swing in the attic of the apartment building. The investigating officer quickly concludes she was murdered. He has only one day to solve the case and by doing so has a chance to get a glimpse of the lives of the other residents.

title: Infinity
description: If you try to kill a mistake then the process becomes infinite.

title: Zompyre Rising
description: Set in the post-Apocalyptic Southwest seven years after the outbreak of a deadly and unstoppable virus, Zompyre Rising tells the dramatic and action-packed story of a small band of survivors who face relentlessly insurmountable odds. As their numbers dwindle and infighting threatens to tear the survivors apart, new hope is found that may be the very key to mankind's survival. But as they soon discover, they are not alone; they are being watched, and the virus might not be the biggest threat to their survival after all.

title: Priyappetta Nattukare
description: A political thriller centered around a communist party activist and his squabbles with the activist of an opposing party.

title: Weight Times Arm Equals Moment
description: A short film playing with the properties of balance. This project began as an exploration of the equation 'weight times arm equals moment.' It is an attempt to unpack what it means to create a moment, to establish an equilibrium between two unequal things.

title: Hate
description: Eight stories of malice and mayhem, death and dismemberment, jealousy and revenge.

title: The Mercury Cycle
description: David Bushell, a college student struggling with social anxiety, discovers that his roommate is a member of a mysterious underground cult. David sneaks into a meeting and discovers that the cult is on the brink of a new "Mercury Cycle," a mysterious pill-induced visit to the past. When David impulsively steals a bottle of pills in hopes of resurrecting his former happiness, he finds himself mixed up in a twisted journey that blurs the line between free will and fate. David struggles to repair his life and defy a future doomed by his own curiosity.

title: Checkmate
description: A mechanical woman tries to live her live normally until the government catches up with her.

title: Il giorno dell'odio
description: Gianni is a young criminal who is indebted to the nasty gang boss "Er Tajola". He must find a bunch of money by evening and he'll dive into absurd and dangerous situations.

title: Ghosts of Old Shanghai
description: Ghosts of Old Shanghai is a Horror/Thriller film with elements of Chinese mythology, history, comedy, and martial arts. Set against the compelling backdrop of modern Shanghai, it's an entertaining and chilling horror experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Mark and Jessica move into an old Shanghai 'lane house' from the 1930s, and strange things start to happen. Mark finds odd symbols, and has disturbing experiences that lead him to believe he is haunted by shadows of Shanghai's violent past. Mark meets a handsome Chinese tour guide, a fascinating English neighbor, an absurd self-help guru, and an eccentric German historian. But who are his real friends? His descent into darkness leads to a deadly confrontation with an ancient evil.

title: Unnecessary Fear
description: As a woman walks home from her boyfriend's house she is terrified by the film she has just finished watching about a stalker who mutilates his victims. She accidentally drops her keys and a man attempts to return them to her. The man reminds her of the stalker in the film and the events that ensue begin to mirror that of the film.

title: The Cure
description: In this post-apocalyptic action short, the Raiders and the Resistance battle to find the cure for a deadly water contaminant.

title: The Interrogation
description: An accused child molester is brought in for questioning by a hard edged detective, who will get the answers he wants one way or the other.

title: Happy Christmas: A Modern Christmas Carol
description: Awakening in the yard of his best friend, Tristan is told that he has been missing for two days after going to a Christmas party. Tristan also discovers that he has numbers drawn on his chest and must discover what the numbers mean which will lead him to a self examination of where he's headed in life.

title: Camcorder
description: A man makes a documentary about women who have survived abusive relationships.

title: Black Heart Anatomy
description: Still coping with the loss of her fiance one year after his flight mysteriously disappears, Abrey's life enters a schism of fear and understanding when she's stalked by strangers who offer to reunite her with her one true love.

title: Camera Obscura
description: Struggling with conflicted views and a vision of his own, a photographer considers himself an ordinary man. But when a new found obsession becomes a faked reality, not even a stranger can cover up what isn't real, in the short film 'Camera Obscura'.

title: On the other side
description: Neha suspects Vikram of infidelity after having spent 5 years together. The suspicion grows every moment as she feels the presence of an unknown entity around her, which has been trying to convey her something through means other than known human senses.

title: Un Hombre Está Tumbado En El Suelo
description: A man is digging a hole with his own hands on the ground. There, he finds a bottle. This leads us to a room where he and his girlfriend discuss about their relationship.

title: Exit 91 Summerland
description: EXIT 91 SUMMERLAND is a low budget love story/ ghost story, about a fun loving your couple starring fresh faced- Megan Dewitt and Curtis( Josh Pomer) . The story begins with the couple who want to get away from the town that they live in Wyoming and experience something that they have never seen before. They land on a town called Summerland California, and proceed to make their way there in Curtis's 1970 Black Lincoln Continental Coupe. They then move in and start to discover that they have essentially moved into a apartment that has dark secrets and they slowly become possessed by the spirits of Summerland.

title: Mad in Italy
description: A young woman in the hands of a maniac fights to stay alive.

title: Melinda
description: Melinda returns home to find herself greeted by unexpected company.

title: On the Inside
description: What would you do if somebody took everything - your dignity, your husband, your children. Would you keep silent? Would you take revenge? Based on the true story of the massacres of Kivu in Kongo.

title: Virus
description: Four hours into Kevin's new job, a force lurking in the computer network threatens to destroy everything and everyone.

title: Foreclosure
description: An ambitious real-estate investor quits the urban landscape that made him rich, escaping to one of his remote properties purchased on a foreclosure. But running from the temptations and ghosts that haunt him back in Los Angeles lead him to demons in the northern woods which prove far more damning than anything he ever faced in the big city.

title: Light Rail
description: While traveling on a light rail train, a girl notices a man stalking a woman and begins to stalk him.

title: Zodiac
description: In 1969 San Francisco, a mysterious serial killer started murdering innocents, and send disturbing letter to local newspaper.

title: The Chronicles of Agent Spy and Dr. Villian
To Haunt You
description: Strange things start to happen to Jill when she breaks up with her boyfriend of the past few months. The phone keeps ringing but there's no one there, she sees strange messages on her TV screen, and a strange teenage girl is hanging around her home. Is it all a campaign of harassment by her ex boyfriend--or is it something more? 'To Haunt You' is the first feature from Indianapolis, IN based Liberty or Death Productions.

title: Saki the Killer
description: Daughter to a slain Yakuza boss, Saki delves deep into her subconscious as an artist to find the darkness of her killer instincts.

title: The Robbery
description: A man tries to rob a house, but doesn't exactly find what he's looking for.

title: Torn
description: For his 21st birthday party Derrek and some friends escape for the weekend to an isolated cabin in the middle of the woods. Derrek's brother, Ethan gatecrashes the party and after a malevolent prank goes wrong resulting in the death of Derrek's girlfriend. Reactions vary from calling the police to disposing of the body, sides are taken and they question what they would do to survive.

title: The Beast
description: Bo-Ra and her brother, Tae-Hun, lose their grandmother they have been living with since their parents' death. But soon after he gets shocking news that Bo-ra has been kidnapped. The kidnappers plan to use Bo-ra in an online porno and threaten to post it on the web by 10 pm on the following day. Tae-hun embarks on an urgent mission to find his sister and get her back from the kidnappers.

title: Four Warnings
description: Four Warnings is a collection of four short thrillers from S&N Films. The following movies are included in this collection: The Footpath Strangler, Liar's Mask, Bitter Red, and Revolution Room.

title: Dead Pulse: A Cultural Phenomenon
description: Detectives Lloyd and Wiley are not your average detectives. While one relies on logical thinking, the other detective has a special skill to solve cases. This is the second episode in this web series entitled DEAD Pulse. Wiley just purchased a new home. The place, however, might not be completely empty. Together, they must solve the mystery behind William's sudden disappearance. As the story unravels, they realize that when it comes to the list of suspects that is not short handed.

title: Alien Vengeance: The Other Me
description: A woman accused of killing a policeman has no memory of the event, but her reflection does. Sarah is sure that she is not the type of person to hurt anyone, but the Federal agents who have planted cameras in her house aren't sure that she's a person at all. Not anymore. Now Sarah is left arguing with her mirror reflection and trying to figure out just who is control of her body, life and destiny.

title: The Playroom
description: Twin brothers are forced to play a high-stakes poker game that changes their lives forever.

title: Il quadro
description: The Picture is a short movie by Luigi Passarelli telling about a clash between a painter and a strange artwork lover.

title: Seven days
description: SEVEN DAYS Ringo, a DJ, gets accused of a murder which he had not committed but is given an opportunity to prove his innocence within seven days. Director: Tathagata Bhattacherjee Producer: Dilip Choudhury Music: Debjit Bera Cast: Saheb Chatterjee, Sreelekha Mitra, Moubani Sorcar, Deepankar De, Shubhashish Mukherjee.

title: Wounded
description: Wounded tells the story of former soldier John Woods. When he returns from Afghanistan with horrific injuries he settles into a new life haunted by the accident that caused his injuries. On a chance moment John witnesses a neighbor abusing his young son. Without taking long to make a decision John finds himself on the run with the young lad. With the police and the boys family pursuing them they speed across the country with John trying to find a way out of this mess. The film concludes with a showdown on Clacton Pier and a concluding twist that helps John escape the nightmare.

title: Offense
description: Michelle is substituting a caregiver who has gone out of town. She never complains and she loves her job. But an unexpected nightmare unfolds in her very eyes and her best defense is offense.

title: The Scream of the Screaming Screamer!
description: A woman, trapped in a recurring nightmare involving an inflatable painting, vows to get a good night's rest -- by any means necessary.

title: Dark Bridge
description: David White is an American surgeon who comes to Bangkok for a conference. He meets a mysterious Thai woman who guides him towards a past he did not know changing his role, from a respected surgeon to a confused detective, to finally discover his father's hidden story and consequences.

title: Sightings
description: Three students shooting a story about an abandoned army base for a school school project disappear. Lost video footage is found of three students shooting a school project which shows their final minutes.

title: Split Paths
description: Jack Smith and Kate Jones are hunted down by a secret organisation whose motives are grim. As people are captured and killed, time is running out for those left behind and those who have vanished.

title: Ghostwriter
description: Aaron Drake, a murder mystery writer is devastated by the sudden and unexpected death of his wife and can no longer write. He wakes up one morning to find pages and pages written for him. He then has to find out if he is going crazy or if his wife who he always wrote for has come back to help him.

title: By a Strand
description: A Detective, sick of the justice system, forces six people into a building, inside they must face off with their worst nightmares. In one grueling night they must decide what's worth living for and what they'd kill for.

title: In Transit
description: A man wakes up to strange happenings in his home, to discover his life is forever changed.

title: The Model
description: In a world where physical bodies are only products referred to as 'models', a young girl is fascinated by the idea of colors on the faces and hair of newer models.

title: Trail of Blood
description: A journey of the psyche, in which a schizophrenic man, Crane, attempts to escape a horrible secret that haunts him relentlessly.

title: Shall Come to Pass
description: Will you be prepared when the end comes?

title: The Haunted Files
description: Sandra has a beautiful house, a handsome fiance, and life is good. Why then, is she so troubled?

title: I Regalu
description: A girl accepts a gift from whom she thinks its her boyfriend, but instead the gift turns out to be a curse from something supernatural.

title: Abduction
description: A paranoid alien conspiracy theorist exposes the events surrounding his abduction.

title: Client 14
description: A slew of beautiful escorts are brutally murdered by an unseen knife wielding killer. The events soon traumatize a Private Investigator as he is unable to protect the escorts he befriends.

title: Dave Patten: Misérable
description: After his fiancée is murdered by a Philly street gang in a heist gone wrong, Patten turns to dark magic to seek revenge.

title: Grad School
description: At her wit's end after working all hours to finish an important term paper, a graduate student is mugged while walking home from campus. Now she's about to lose all her belongings, including the paper she just finished. What begins as one of those moments we all fear takes a turn for the unexpected.

title: Konstantin
description: A Russian soldier-turned-hitman defies his superiors to protect the wife of an old friend.

title: Apostate
description: The perfect couple must face an awful truth delivered by a determined stranger.

title: Closure
description: Unable to live with herself after committing the ultimate betrayal, Erica struggles to make peace with her husband, Steve, and seeks one final opportunity to put it all behind her and move forward in an uncertain life with a new man.

title: Iceberg Theory
description: An author, struggling to meet an intense deadline, must choose between his passion and his sanity.

title: Alicen's Diary
description: Alicen Wyatt, a struggling actress who is recording a video diary in the hopes of securing a reality TV show, is down on her luck - so best friend Jeri Smythe jokes that she should perform a ritual for money. With Alicen's sister Cameron's help, they do so; but after a brief prosperity, an evil entity attacks, demanding payment - with someone's life.

title: The Lost Souls
description: A cautionary tale about misspent youth. Tubby and Johnny try and fight off boredom during their last School summer vacation by involving themselves with the local bad gang. They end up on Cramond Island with a night the two will remember for ever. Sex,love, and violence will all be experienced during this week, in this coming of age 'DARK COMEDY' drama. We join various groups who turn to the dark side of life to survive.

title: Driven Insane
description: Beware which road you choose in this cautionary tale where the hunter becomes the hunted.

title: Lucidate
description: A girl realizes she is in an unfamiliar place. She realizes she can do and change what she wants to how she sees fit. Uncontrollably, she has the urge to carry out a murder of a Taiwan male named Huan Hui Lee.

title: Closer Than They Appear
description: A great lesson learned in trusting what your mirror is showing you.

title: Gist
description: Amon tries to fill out the emptiness in his heart with violence against former band members and their relatives regarding the shock he had suffered from watching the girl, he is in love with kissing the lead singer of the band.

title: Dogs Lie
description: Eight patients and two staff meet at luxurious NY sleep clinic for a night of observation and hi tech monitoring.Their lives become dangerously entwined as secrets are revealed.Love,blackmail and murder ensue.

title: Good Intentions
description: A retired couple find themselves aiding a helpless young women on the run from unknown assailants.

title: Strange Eyes
description: James has lived in the rural Wheat Belt all his life, working the land and breeding cattle and he would have it no other way. Caught in his isolation and solitude, James sometimes feels like there has been something amiss in his life as he now lives away from his partner. He is also tensely aware of a presence at the old farm with him - watching him from the darkness beyond the windows. Whatever the thing may be, James feels a sense of nostalgia in its presence and he knows it will somehow change him forever.

title: The Infernal Room
description: In an old house, behind a marked door, lies an Evil waiting to cross the gateway of hell into our world and escape The Infernal Room.

title: A Nervous Tick
description: A tick, a doll, duplicity and twisted minds, all unfurl in this surreal psycho thriller.

title: Cleansed
description: A blindingly religious young woman kidnaps the town's promiscuous party girl when she believes God has destined her to cleanse the party girl's sinful soul.

title: Biester müssen sterben
description: Arriving at the estate of the rich Talmon-Family psychologist Gina Malone finds herself trapped immediately in a deadly web of a crushing social machinery infused with malicious dark twists.

title: Caller Unknown
description: A 9-1-1 operator receives a call from someone who has been in a serious car accident, unfortunately, the line is not traceable as it comes in as an unknown caller. As the operator tries to figure out where the exact location of the victim is, a chilling twist is revealed.

title: Don't Shout Too Loud
description: Set against the backdrop of the world's most viewed sporting event, Don't Shout Too Loud explores the anticipated increase in human trafficking in South Africa leading up to the 2010 FIFA World Cup. With the opening ceremony of the games only weeks away and media reports of 40,000 women and children being trafficking into host cities, the film poses difficult and rarely asked questions about the human trafficking issue as seen through the efforts of public officials and activists as they race to ready themselves and the citizens of South Africa before the first match.

title: Abram's Hand
description: Seven friends fight to escape a violent death and struggle with the knowledge that their death's might be punishment from the hand of God.

title: 5 Year Dream
description: Sophia (Rebekah Bruflodt) and Luis (Julio Antonio Alonzo) have been the closest of friends for five years but unbeknownst to Luis, Sophia has been in love with him since the beginning. That is until a night of passion; Sophia's true and delusional feelings are revealed, which leads to an explosive confrontation that will change their lives forever.

title: Only the Strong: Wasteland Wanderer
description: A short film following a survivor in the post-apocalyptic wastes, exploring both his memories of the life he left behind and his efforts to survive in the barren mountains after the mysterious toppling of civilization.

title: Sketchy House
description: After discovering some terrifying eight-millimeter footage from the late 1970s, and finding out the locations it was recorded at, three student filmmakers hit the roads of Southeastern North Carolina to shoot a documentary about the obscure locations, and everything they hope to find from the eight-millimeter while they're there. During the production of their documentary, weird things start to happen, leading to the disappearance of one of the filmmakers, and capturing one of the most frightening incidents ever caught on video.

title: InkLab
description: In the digital age, where megabyte is the new dynamite and power of ideas and connectivity cannot be ignored, this is an experiment in the Lab of thoughts - InkLab. The P.O.V. film made with a zero budget in Cinema-verite style is set in the sociopolitical scenario when India is fighting against corruption and a sizable mass movement has already built up all across the nation.

title: The Blackness
description: Waking in a hospital bed, Jamie Stanton finds himself in excruciating pain. He cannot communicate with those around him. He quickly realizes things are not as they seem and those once trusted have become captors. His quest to find the answer to his true identity depends on an elusive little girl. Is she an image from the past or a mirage of self delusion?

title: Out Go the Lights
description: When Joe Orpheo, a young, Hollywood-endorsed auteur director disappears from the decrepit and empty house location of his big-buck feature shoot - along with his entire cast and crew - opportunistic B-Movie titan Derek LeClair declares squatter's rights and starts setting up a feature shoot of his own in the same house. But the terrible fate of Joe's cast and crew also awaits Derek and his collaborators. The slasher flick hack and the up-and-coming wunderkind bring their opposing artistic visions to bear in a final confrontation that has a third creative presence as well, one only interested in possessing souls both above and below the line.

title: The Gossip Collector
description: A woman is collecting garbage as a way to dig deeper in another's personal story. She finds a small box that belongs to a girl who is about to commit suicide, but she looks upon a matter as entertainment. Whenever the girl hesitates kill herself, the viewer shows her displeasure. After watching her try a couple of times, tired of waiting, she finally decides to take matters into her own hands.

title: Hester Prynne
description: Robert Cleaver (Brian Jagger) patiently waits for his wife, Martha, to meet him at the theater. But what Robert doesn't realize is that there is already something at the theater waiting for him.

title: D.W.T.
description: There is rising concern about reckless driving on the road. It's a Halloween eve and some friends are going for a costume party , what they don't know is there is someone watching them and it will change everything.

title: Les hommes sont des Rêves
description: Imagine waking up to find yourself in a bathroom, completely naked, blood on the tile, a smoking revolver and a corpse with a bullet through his head. That's how Boris' life began, or rather his new life, as he is an amnesiac. Two people strive to help him in the quest to discover his past: Mordange, an old photographer and Jeanne a beautiful psychotherapist.

title: The Prince of Town
description: A kid has special powers: he can heal people, read the future for eight to ten years per person, and freeze time for 2.5 minutes. One day he is asked by the government to read the future of the nation. He refuses, saying it is impossible. One week later, the government hires an assassin to kills the kid. But, the kid comes back to life to take vengeance.

title: Anonymous Celebrities: Animatic
description: Nerdy Herbert meets Annie, the holier-than-thou girl of his dreams. But his plans for romance might be derailed by a nasty punk rocker, a mad scientist, obsessed federal agents... and mysterious aliens bent on destroying the planet!

title: Incident at Barstow
description: Abby and Griff, driving into Los Angeles, find themselves in possession of a body and a bag of money. Pursued by the henchman of the mysterious and powerful Mr Colpeper, they enter a downward spiral of futile reaction and bad faith.

title: Paradise
description: In the chaos in the Aftermath of the Civil War an "outbreak" occurs. This is that story.

title: Sick of Larry
description: Three college students move into the home of a recently widowed woman, then come to the conclusion that the widow's disturbing new boyfriend Larry is trying to poison her.

title: Date Night
description: A boy, a girl, and a Polaroid.

title: TDO: The Day Off
description: The video is about an assassination attempt on a American agent on his yearly day off.

title: Ever Been in Love?
description: A neo-noir about the crazy things that love can make people do.

title: Swindled
description: Eddie Oliver is unemployed, lives by himself, and never goes outside. He spends most of his days pondering things that would never cross most people's minds, and trying to re-connect with his girlfriend, Kim. Eddie is very paranoid, and unstable. He loves Kim very much and badly wants her to know how deeply he feels for her. But his mental instability and paranoia just might prove to be too powerful an adversary for him to overcome.

title: Kill Shot: Lou
description: In Seattle, the solemn career hit-man Lou (Stevan Vujic) is visited by syndicate enforcer Crowe (Thom McCloud) after the tragic apparent suicide of Cassandra, the love of Lou's life. However, Crowe has orders from syndicate boss Barker that put him in a painful conflict.

title: The Curable
description: The Curable is an 80min Psychological Thrill-Ride through the molecules of scientific terror. A paranoid, pharmaceutically challenged man awakes one day to find himself inside a run-down, scientific research facility. The professors inhabiting the place believe the man to be 'contaminated' and take extreme measures to 'cure' him. Written, produced, directed, shot, edited & scored by one person, this ultra low-budget, grind-house affair aims to annihilate your senses, make your flesh crawl and leave your brain decimated.

title: Suburban Rebels
description: Enticed by the proposition of easy money, Jesse and Billy; agree to make a new street narcotic for a mysterious crime lord only known as "He". Time is against them as they struggle to mix the ingredients before it's too late.

title: Caffe dei Libri
description: After his night shift a barman can't get out of the coffee shop where he works. His girlfriend is anxiously waiting to meet with him in another part of the town. While he is trying to get out, he finds out that mysterious entities live there after closing time, and some of them can be violent. Reality becomes a nightmare even more when the girlfriend shows up. Her life is at risk too. They are going to learn, during the creepy and surreal night, that the only way out to survive will be facing their own fears.

title: Shh
description: After his arrest, a disturbed young man is sent to a mental hospital for evaluation. He comes to believe the staff at the hospital is trying to harm him.

title: The Killing Game
description: In an abandoned warehouse, two men find themselves playing a desperate game for survival against a menacing hitman with a mysterious agenda.

title: A 2nd Before Hell Freezes Over
description: After stealing some seed money from his mobster father, Gweedo and his pregnant girlfriend find that escaping from a life of violence isn't as easy as they planned.

title: Hi There Horror Movie Fans
description: "Hi There Horror Movie Fans" was a biographical documentary on the horror host Bill Bowman and his character "The Bowman Body".

title: Fight or Flight
description: A young man (Keith Withers) says some things that have become unpopular, and is chased to within an inch of his life.

title: Wax Turtles
description: A young man hits a streak of bad luck after winning a small fortune in the local lottery, as his life deteriorates, he slowly puts together why.

title: Delusional
description: A man struggles with his grip on reality after the woman he loves leaves him.

title: Creed
description: In the midst of his own investigation in pursuit of his wife's killer, Jon encounters supernatural elements that make him realize he is in over his head.

title: Jaded
description: Running for her life, a woman is chased by a knife wielding man, with nowhere to go but up.

title: 3 Line
description: Four students discuss their final year project; an investigative documentary on the myth of "Soucouyants" in the rural community of Toco. Marcus the leader of the group delegates while his ditsy girlfriend Carrie plays with her hair. Jade looks on disinterested while Troy tests out the camera and focuses on Jade's back dimples. Two cars set out for a remote fishing village in Toco where rampant disappearances have stained the village for decades. They hear hilarious stories from drunken locals and then head off for their beach house. They get lost and stop to ask a local villager, Lil Caesar for directions. While pulling up to the estate they meet up with Marcus' best friend Benjy. Jade is clearly upset to see her ex-boyfriend. Marcus sets up a surveillance camera in the house to safeguard their lives and the expensive video equipment. That night some supposedly harmless games leave Jade feeling more vulnerable. While everyone is asleep the camera captures Jade sleep walking while a light flashes outside the beach house The next morning Marcus sets up another camera outside the house while Troy uses the voyeuristic lens of his camera to make mischief. They take the debauchery to the beach. There Jade sees Lil Caesar who ironically lives on the same property with his father Set and two brothers Ray and Abraham. Jade openly flirts with Lil Caeser in front of Benjy and they walk off along a path that runs parallel to the beach. Lil Caeser grabs Jade's camera and records her; at his request she begins to strip for him. He tells her to turn around and close her eyes. Jade asks if he has condoms and Caesar simply laughs and buries his teeth into her neck. He overpowers her and sinks his teeth into her inner thigh. Everyone is startled when they hear Jade's screams. Troy records as Marcus and Benjy run off in the direction of the screams. A fight ensues leaving Lil Caesar face down in the frothy water. Carrie helps Jade as they assemble at the house to figure out their next move. Back at the house Candice applies rubbing alcohol to the bloody "hiccie" on Jade's neck and inner thigh. Troy notices Abraham coming up the track from the beach holding Lil Caesar. They prepare to leave. As they run to the vehicle it is already too late. They look on in horror as Set, Abraham and Ray begin running towards the house cutlass shining in the afternoon sun. Marcus, makes his way back inside the house, Candice runs into the SUV, Benjy and Troy run off in separate directions. Ray and Abraham make Benjy and Troy kneel as Set paces. Benjy's insolence unsettles Set and he sends for a cigar and a can of kerosene. Everyone looks on as Benjy is doused in kerosene. In true anticlimax the lighter refuses to spark so Ray and Abraham turn their cutlasses on him. Candice records the entire horrific incident from inside the SUV. Set carves into Troy's chest forcing Marcus to forsake his own safety and run to Troy's aid. Set is lenient and spares them both. Marcus helps troy back into the house. Set torments them as he offers them lunch and a sense of false hope. With their backs turned to her, Candice uses the opportunity to flee the SUV and she runs into a forested area. Set leaves his prey and to Marcus' dismay he walks off in Candice's direction. Marcus makes a run for it leaving the door open, allowing Abraham to have some harmless fun with Carrie and Troy. He leaves with a grin as he sees signs of Jade's imminent transformation taking shape. Candice comes upon a house and enters it in hopes of finding a landline. She stumbles in the darkness and comes face to face with Lil Caesar's dead body lying on a coffee table. Set walks in and Candice hides in the kitchen as he takes a piss. He then walks into the kitchen and senses her presence. He searches for her while she cowers under the kitchen sink. He finds her and she runs straight into Ray. Her camera drops from her hand and Ray picks it up. They chase after her and Candice jumps onto a small stone bench. 100 feet below the waves crash against jagged rocks. Set sadistically torments her, while she warns them to keep their distance. Set smiles and continues to approach her. Marcus runs in to save his sister but he is easily subdued by Ray. They use Marcus as bait to coax her into descending. Candice closes her eyes as she steps backwards plummeting to her death on the rocks below. Marcus is dragged back to their house and is brutally tortured. Hours pass and Carrie and Troy pace around the room. Jade gets increasingly worse as she vomits incessantly. A distraught Troy blames Marcus for bringing them to this God forsaken place. Troy's monologue is interrupted by Marcus' faint call at the door. Carrie opens the door and he collapses in her arms. They share an intimate moment. Troy observes their attackers waiting nearby as the sun dips behind the mountains. Lil Caesar, a bit stiff and pale joins his brothers and father as they stand around the house. Troy looks on in horror as they turn into balls of flames. The balls of flames fly into the air as they emit a high pitched squeal. Troy helps Marcus up and they make a last ditched run for it. Troy runs back into the house for Jade but she lunges at him sinking her teeth into his neck. Troy falls to the ground and Jade walks out of the room. She reappears and destroys the surveillance camera. Carrie and Marcus run for dear life but they stumble and fall. The fireballs fly past overhead as they share a last moment together before they are both dragged off.

title: Invalid Debris
description: Invalid Debris is a psychological thriller examining the complicated sequence of events leading up to a young man's death at the hands of a gang.

title: Deja Vu
description: When we are shown a glimpse of the future do we do something to change it when it starts to come true or simply shrug it off as a case of deja vu?

title: Exit Only
description: A man is slowly overcome by his growing paranoia, but is he really crazy, or is the danger real?

title: Eternal Water
description: Torture is not always physical. Sometimes choices will be made that will eternally torture your mind.

title: Klingenberg
description: Former police inspector Wolfgang Klingenberg is brought into a retirement home against his will. Rather than integrate, Wolfgang starts to rebel against the home's rules. His gut feeling tells him that something is wrong. When a resident disappears without a trace and is declared dead, he becomes suspicious and sets out to find him. He comes up against the home director and the nurses, but he is convinced that he is about to uncover a conspiracy. Before he realizes it he has been drugged. But he manages to gather his strength one last time to finally bring the truth to light.

title: Osiris Ford
description: A failed novelist struggles to reconnect with his son, win back the love of his life, and avert the apocalypse.

title: Slasher
description: A slasher film is gloriously obvious, but therein lies the possibility for play. Using the violence of the cut and splicing a narrative out of darkness, the unseen of the movie both harbors and executes murder.

title: A Bit Drastic
description: Told in reverse, we follow a man through a park in search of what caused him pain.

title: Chiaroscuro
description: The transition between here and the afterlife is a stupefying and amazing mystery. The moving visuals of Chiaroscuro provide a creative, multiple perspective story on the troubles of one girl, and her subsequent move from this life into the next.

title: The Deceived
description: Mike executes all his enemies overcome by emotion of losing and witnessing his girl friend's murder, stumbles hearing the truth about the real murderer and starts for his real revenge. The film is a full entertainer carries various emotions packed with full suspense throughout.

title: Memory
description: A former homicide detective with a photographic memory so intense that the past and the present are indistinguishable must leave his self-imposed exile and confront the case that left him a broken man.

title: Crash
description: lovely simple and gentle crash with techno soundtrack

title: Mystery Cache
description: The generous invitation to Bavaria by famous King Ludwig II historian PROFESSOR BUEKREL starts out as a great opportunity for MALINA, writing her thesis on the Bavarian King. While touring the famous Bavarian castles Neuschwanstein and Herrenchiemsee together with the professor, her boyfriend GABRIEL, who accompanied her to Bavaria, is on the hunt of a famous and still undiscovered geocache, hidden somewhere in Bavaria. As his treasure hunt leads him all over Bavaria, he soon not only finds out that all the geocaches are somehow connected to Kind Ludwig II, but also that the professor seems to be somehow involved in all this. When he understands that Malina is in great danger, it is already too late.

title: Griffey's Theory
description: Dorothy's reading 'Griffey's Theory,' a paperback about an alien invasion and three isolated characters. The novel's plot becomes dangerously familiar when Dorothy learns of an actual alien sighting.

title: Trial by Self
description: Torn apart by seemingly trivial life events, Tony Fisher, who was once a loving father and husband is now self destructive, despondent and emotionally unavailable. His daughter Sarah avoids being at home because of the awkward family situation, while his wife Keri tries her best to reach Tony. Meanwhile, people around them are meeting violent ends and this is taking a toll on the family. They are all in for a wild and violent ride on the way to a suspenseful and thought provoking conclusion.

title: Killer
description: 'Killer' is a stop motion and clay animation video that shows us four happy little dolls having a great time in the woods during wintertime. They surprise us with the 'gourmet' meat they're having for barbecue. Unlike many fantasies translated to the world of animation, in this piece there's no moralizing preoccupation with innocence or guilty because these characters are aggressors and victims, whose actions only further indict them. 'Killer' is a comment on our lifestyle based on consumerism and disposable lives. These characters congratulate themselves and gather around their 'prize' like ladies do when they find a bargain at a fashion shop. It is also a humorous take on the word 'man-eater'.

title: Where the Dogs Divide Her
description: Where the Dogs Divide Her begins amid the aftermath of a family massacre. A nameless man sits in an unfamiliar bathroom, his bloodied hands trembling as he ponders his crime of passion. An amnesiac without an identity, he goes in search of himself, only to unearth a long-buried family secret surrounding the bizarre deaths of his parents. An abstract ghost story populated by ever-threatening specters, shadowy souls with evil motives who inhabit a nightmare world within a troubled killer's psyche. They might offer a smile or a kind word, but their only purpose is to snare others into their Hell. Before the killer can come to terms with his deeds and escape this esoteric prison, he must confront his dead parents and make good on an infant's promise made thirty years ago.

title: Mud & Water
description: Emily Rue wakes up from a horrific dream that her best friend has been murdered... only to find it has really happened! ..or did it? What is the line between the conscious & unconscious, the barrier between what is real & what is a dream, and who decides what exists in the spiritual world? Emily is about to find out...

title: Metamorphosis
description: Metamorphosis is a movie about identity, burden of existence and the mystery of life and death.

title: The Attack
description: The world is pretty scary out there. It's best not to think about it. In this short, horror video two female roommates find themselves smacked in the face with some scary reality which threatens to infringe on their superficial existence. Using and subverting the classic genre of traditional zombie movie to, this low budget tale aims to consider who the real zombies are.

title: Danny Greene
description: Danny is a somewhat average teenager going through the normal phases of adolescence. His jaded personality plagues his friends but, why should he care? In a secret alleyway that is his haven, he meets a man named Oliver who offers him a chance to fill his life with meaning. Blindly, he accepts. But what is a true promise when it is offered by the devil himself.

title: Death of a Salesman
description: A moving storyboard set in 1955. A husband seeks revenge to a person that attacked his wife.

title: Sing the Blues
description: Set in the city of Kyoto, and inspired by a true story about a grisly murder that terrorised Japan, "Sing the Blues" follows Hashimoto on his journey to Kyoto to escape a past life and seek a new beginning. While there, he meets a motley crew of colourful characters. One night, a neighbour unwittingly reminds him of his dark past and he finds himself withdrawing from society again. Meanwhile Kenji, a detective from Tokyo, arrives in Kyoto on a lead that a murder suspect is in the city and about to strike again. Their paths intersect, to devastating effect.

title: Keepers of the Sick: Prologue
description: Love Conquers All. In a world where people don't die, folk lore explains that for a small payment the Keepers remove the sick from the thresholds of life. In a prologue to a much larger story, Jacob refuses to let the love of his life be taken by the Keepers and now he must travel to the ends of the world and to the underworld and back to save her.

title: Action Figures
description: Sometime in the 21st century, a new evil threatens humankind. Meet the fundamentalist movie fan! Raised by violence in the media and armed to the teeth, these suburban thugs declare holy war against Hollywood in a string of horrific mass shootings threatening the very fabric of human civilization! A bizarre cult of militant nerds addicted to fantasy and obsessed with blockbuster movies like Star Wars and Batman begin to stalk humans as prey, treating their victims like living toys for their own sick entertainment. Can anyone stop these psychos from dragging the world into a war which to them is little more than a live game of Action Figures? In a strange new world ruled by Star Wars Fundamentalists comes the first chapter in the darkest mythology the world has ever known!

title: Friends for Eternity
description: How far would you go to keep your best friend forever?

title: Szaman
description: You can't run from the inner fears. In the desert, two women penetrate into a spiritual world, where a shaman will transform himself in the face of terror.

title: An Unfinished List
description: The nature of evil. When a person becomes consumed by evil, does that evil end with their death? Or does it live on in their children?

title: The Game
description: Mark, Dean and Kloe the cat are home alone when things get odd.

title: Bird-Scorpion
description: Bird-Scorpion is about the struggle of Americans and how the wars and conflicts in other countries is brought to our doorstep. A thriller that takes two guys on the adventure of their lives as they discover their true hearts and fight the evil that attempts to take over their house. With the help of some unlikely friends they will learn the fight together for the greater cause of freedom.

title: The Fifth Door
description: Five teenage girls enter a shared dream at a sleepover by means of a 'Dream Circle' and find themselves in an abandoned house where another girl had disappeared fifteen years earlier. When only four of the girls awake they are convinced that the spirit of the missing teen is holding their friend captive. Only one girl has the faith to enter the fifth door so that the others can go free. Is her fate somehow tied to a mysterious silver cross and the biblical story of Lazarus?

title: My First Horror Movie
description: Who's to say what's 'good' and what's 'evil?' Certainly not the people who kill in the name of 'God'.

title: Dancing with Dictators: The Story of the Last Foreign Publisher in Burma
description: DANCING WITH DICTATORS is a film about Burma and the battle for control of a newspaper. Central to the story is Australian publisher Ross Dunkley who owns The Myanmar Times. Like all media in Myanmar the newspaper is heavily censored. The government has forced a 51% partner on Dunkley and after the first election in 20 years their enmity explodes. Dunkley is arrested and imprisoned as his Immigration charges turn into a sexual smear campaign. His partner takes control and the government moves towards ending any foreign ownership of the Burmese media.

title: Mounting Marcy
description: After failing to summit the previous winter, 4 young alpinists risk it all in a harrowing bid to reach the pinnacle of Mount Marcy - 33rd tallest mountain in the United States east of Colorado.

title: Punaisen metsän hotelli
description: A European cameraman, who lives in Beijing and speaks fluent Chinese, travels to South China. His plans to interview a human rights activist and farmers suddenly come to a halt when propaganda officials stop him. The officials proudly tell him about their tight relationship with a forestry giant which plans to build a paper mill in the area. In the meantime the police arrest the human rights lawyer. The filmmaker gets caught into an absurd situation and is under surveillance for days.

title: The Forlorn
description: Richa, a young lady moves in to a new apartment. Sambit, a psychologist, lives in her adjacent apartment. The previous occupant of Richa's new apartment is dead and Richa finds a diary of that person. Richs is an introvert and spends most of the time knowing about the previous occupant from his diary. Sambit finds gradual behavioral changes in her and Richa starts to experience hallucinations.

title: In the Ranaissance
description: She was born in the Renaissance, but wasn't everyone?

title: Terrorville
description: 5 people receive a mysterious invitation to a dinner party at an isolated mansion. Little do they know what is in store for them. In the midst of dinner; a dead body abruptly crashes through the ceiling. The guests then realize that they are trapped in this mansion - pawns of someone's cruel game. Before they can react to this shocking turn of events, the effects of the drugged meal seep in. They each black out. And the fun begins

title: Maslow's Lab
description: Traumatized by the accidental death of his niece on Easter Day, a man is trapped inside a laboratory run by a mad psychiatrist specialized in intensive phobia treatments.

title: In Harm's Way: Manhunt
description: Set in the weeks leading up to 'Harm's', Roy Sharp is a former CIA Agent lured out of retirement to hunt down infamous serial killer Marko Markeaur. The prequel to the feature film 'In Harm's Way'.

title: The Evil Dread
description: A short supernatural thriller that brings the fear of an unknown pursuer to a young couple leaving for a camping trip.

title: Luminous
description: Luminous is a short narrative film from the perspective of Sam, a young boy who runs into a dark forest to escape from his abusive father. The story melds one boy's fears with the surreal world that lies beneath.

title: Day Will Fall
description: Day Will Fall follows the fragmented psycho-odyssey of a Soho Debt Collector, whose past, present and future congeal offering a brief moment for redemption.

title: L'Appuntamento
description: In modern society it is increasingly difficult to live without stress and be able to work well. However there are people who hate to be late, In particular with the fate: even the imagination will save you.

title: Life Among the Undead
description: Ryan Mcgivern (A Gothic Tale) writes, directs, and stars as "KURT BOHL" in this 70's drive thru B Art Horror film that pushes the boundaries of humanity. "Life Among the Undead" will take you to depravity, beauty, and everything in between. Also starring Destiny Soria and Ben Watson as the depraved lunatic "Jack".

title: Entropie
description: The paths of seven people cross when they are placed in a cabin to explore paranormal phenomena said to have been witnessed there.

title: Ballet d'action
description: The ballet dancer Elias is seeking the truth about his girlfriends death. The journey takes him closer to a part of himself then to the answer about his girlfriend.

title: Leave
description: This is the story of Maria, a young woman who has come to accept her unorthodox relationship with Juan, who she lives with. A shared moment with a small child breaks the thick wall embedded around Maria's soul, which leads her towards an opportunity for freedom...

title: The Darkness of Improvisation
description: A man is questioned by two detectives about a gruesome murder scene.

title: Next Door Where the Light Shines In
description: Two lonely psychotics search for connection in the bleak, sun-drenched landscape of Los Angeles. as they bounce off - and sometimes leave for dead - therapists, acting coaches, producers and shamans, they move inexorably closer to each other, and the one dark link they truly share.

title: The Trail
description: The Trail tracks the story of frustrated actor turned serial killer Eugene Jeffries, who is pursued by relentless FBI Agents.

title: The Endless
description: The Endless is a film noir inspired by Friedrich Nietzsche's book 'Thus Spoke Zarathustra'. The film follows a nameless man traversing a dark, cold, chaotic city at night. Along the way the man contemplates existence, morality, and the recurring randomness of everything.

title: Actors and Actresses
description: A theatre director, suffering from a bout of writer's block, discovers that his wife is having an affair. From this he finds the inspiration for his latest play - a piece of work which not only blurs the lines between reality and fantasy but also becomes a bizarre form of revenge.

title: The Killing of Leonard Riley
description: For My Brother is a POV drama that follows a man who sets out on a journey to his hometown to avenge the death of his brother. After only serving three months in jail for the drunk driving incident which ended in Ben's brother's death, he decides to create his own justice, and invites his filmmaker friend to document his journey. The shocking twists that unfold during this six-day road trip will be a point of discussion for years to come.

title: 2 Minutes to Death
description: A man wakes up in a basement tied to a chair. Who is he? How did he get here? It doesn't matter, because next to him is a bomb timed to explode in 2 minutes and he's gotta stop it or get out of there - but fast. But how?

title: Action at 00;04;41;04
description: Anxiety grows as an unknown couple absurdly dread the approach of a mysterious white car in a pastoral setting. 'Action at 00;04;41;04' is a dialog with cinematic history, suspense, and the viewers' expectations. Prioritizing sound over the visual, the viewer must make his/her own judgments on the fate of the individuals heard. Much of the sound design has been re-appropriated from Douglas Sirk's 'Written on the Wind' (1956).

title: Little Anna
description: A mother tries to cope and struggle with her emotions and sanity after the lost of her only child.

title: Switch
description: In a futuristic world, a criminal is pursued in a high-speed chase for a valuable yet secretive object in his possession.

title: Flipping
description: A boy, who has been immersed in the memories of losing his ex girlfriend, and suffered from mental delusions, came to Beijing alone in order to find his girlfriend.

title: The Unseen
description: The Unseen is a short film dealing with a young girls confrontation with a life or death decision, and the supernatural battle that rages around her.

title: The Meadows
description: An adventure about death, dreams & lovers set during a severe global economic crisis.

title: On/Off
description: Getting trapped in your own visual universe.

title: Who Else to Blame?
description: What will happen when the killer decides to take on a new victim?

title: Queen of Hearts
description: Wendy's having a bad day. After a deadly encounter with her significant other, she finds herself in another life threatening situation.

title: Midnight Snack
description: Dylan receives a menacing phone call from a dead girl, only to find out that she's in need of a 'midnight snack.'

title: Hard Case Crime
description: The dutch government starts a new undercover agency to deal with national terrorism. The team is lead by an ex-cop by the name of Nick Reddink and is joined by cop Koeper and her team.

title: Alligator Bitch
description: A woman confronts her possible identity through a nightmarish push-pull while losing her grip on reality.

title: The Vagabond
description: When Alex Krueger's friend Megan is kidnapped by a mass murderer known as The Vagabond Killer, he joins forces with Megan's boyfriend, Roy, and her brother, Jason. Together they decide to ignore the police's advice, and hunt the hunter.

title: The Out of Towners
description: A beautiful scientist discovers an alternative fuel that leads her to open a Pandora's box that could leave her dead.

title: DHA: Dos Horas Antes
description: Sci-fi thriller drama about a man who lost his daughter and desperately searches for a way to take her back. This turns out in a crazy adventure through different realities. But this is also a story about love and friendship and how assumptions are never as they look first sight.

title: The Meat Eater
description: Part of JABB pictures breakthrough short film collection The Collective, The Meat Eater is a tale of the last man left in a town devastated by a beast like killer. After several unsuccessful attempts to kill the beast, the man knows a final showdown is inevitable.

title: Illusions
description: What a person goes through when he wakes up one day all bashed up, having weird illusions and finding the corpse of his friend. The short film revolves around the main character who is in pursuit of the killers of his friend with the help of weird illusions.

title: T is for Trash Can
description: Scott is just a typical guy, taking out a typical bag of garbage, on a typical night.

title: China's Hidden Battlefield
description: In a small, remote farming village in China, two clans wage a violent and politically-charged battle for seven years: one wants to build a school, and one does not - who's right?

title: Moscow Diaries, Part 2 - Statues
description: A mystery thriller featuring a rather unusual Russian cab driver.

title: She
description: The sting of love drives a man to madness.

title: Shots 1.2
description: Christian and Diana. 9mm revolver and Leica camera. Shot and shot. An exceptionally love story in today's Berlin.

title: Grit
description: Story of an avenging father suffering the loss of his only child in a quest for a payback.

title: Panic, Fear: Part One
description: A woman wakes up in her Los Angeles apartment. After using the bathroom, she goes to the kitchen for a late night snack. Leaving the kitchen, we get a glimpse of the man who will soon take her life. She gets into bed, only to realize that her husband has been murdered. The killer drags her back into the kitchen to end her life.

title: Method
description: Actor Russell Sherman and his theatrical group are putting on a touring production, and trying not to be torn apart by their own egos and pretensions. But who is the mysterious killer wearing a Cher mask and picking them off one by one?

title: Bread
description: Fox Gomez is cab driver with nothing going right in his life. He has a passenger put into his car by two policemen and is told to take him home. He is taken on a detour around London as the passenger reveals his illegal profession and refuses to pay for the ride home. Fox takes his livelihood seriously and is relentless in pursuing his passenger for the money owed to him, upping the amount for every false turn he makes the driver take. At the end of the day it's about the money that's owed to him: Bread.

title: Caïssa
description: The protagonist of the story called Caissa, which is the name of the chess goddess, is getting ready for an unusual chess game.

title: Your Move
description: It's a warm summer day in the park as two men enjoy a simple game of chess. The mood quickly shifts however when one of the players makes a bold statement, spiraling the game down a dark well of intrigue. Your Move is a short silly homage to Hitchcock and Rod Serling.

title: Lovesick Captivity
description: After returning from a long trip to the U.K., Walter (Charlie Vaughn) is cursed to a life in which he must keep his new British bride, Simone (Katie Costick), a secret from everyone for fear that she may be murdered by an unknown killer. Tensions rise as Walter's professional world begins to collide with his family life; while he is haunted by a lover who has passed on (Robbyn Leigh), tormented by an overbearing mother (Heather Hewitt) and coming to odds with his new wife who is beginning to realize that her life as a happy homemaker may really be an incarceration she may never escape from.

title: Karma Code
description: A young Indian trying to escape his bad past by trying to start a new life and career in another country. But his deeds of the past confronts him within. He uses the KARMA CODE supplied by his good friend to get past the situation.

title: Issues
description: A sex addict visits his psychiatrist who has some issues of her own.

title: Headspace
description: In the world of the mind, Ego, awakes to find his things and his true love have been stolen by his inner demons. He must search his mind and fight his inner demons to recover what he's lost.

title: The Escopeta Boy
description: A troubled Texan teenager kidnaps a group of teens and takes them to a forest.

title: Love Just Is-Emma
description: LOVE JUST IS-EMMA is a 12 episode web series that revolves around 6 people whose lives are intertwined through love. For Emma, a beautiful girl trying to move forward in her life, it takes leaving her boyfriend, Kevin, of seven years to find love in the most unexpected place. For Jack, a non-believer, it takes almost losing his mind for him to see. For Janet, a woman that craves the most unobtainable things, it takes her desire for something real to find love at all. And Kate keeps searching.

title: Kennedy's Crimes
description: The life of Kennedy Gamarra, a rebellious teenager, who in a moment of rage decides to enlist in the army - an experience that will change his life and that of his corrupt relatives.

title: Project Ryan
description: Four people discover a personal connection to poltergeist disturbances while filming a documentary for a private missing persons investigation.

title: Bartender
description: Sydney has been stood, but not even she knows how close her relationship to the bartender really is.

title: Amy Goes to College
description: Amy goes to college, makes some friends, has some fun, loses her mind, buries her friends.

title: Bird Dog, a Canine Flight Fantasy
description: An existential comic thriller. On the night of the 2003 US invasion of Iraq, fire breaks out in a neglected government kennel. One of the dying dogs hallucinates an escape, flies from the kennel, and wreaks havoc on a somnambulant desert community. Bird Dog amuses, confounds, provokes, portends and mortifies with subversive humor, blatant ambiguity, eye-popping epiphanies, and breathtaking Mojave Desert locations. Corrupt leaders,surreal visions, and unrequited drama show what horrors wreak the dogs of war.

title: The Cradle Will Fall
description: A young girl phones the emergency services in distress. The police arrive to find someone who isn't what they first appear.

title: Scum
description:
"EVERY HEART HAS A LIMIT"...

MEET 'JONNY CANE' IN SCUM

title: Make Your Paths Straight
description: Fleeing into the woods after committing a crime, Craig meets Walter, a man who has made his home in the forest. Walter takes Craig under his wing, and tries to help him become a new man, but this process is painful and dangerous.

title: The Problem of Evil
description: An ex-seminary student abducts a priest, a pregnant girl, and her abortion doctor, forcing them to confront the morality of their choices.

title: The Kidnapping
description: The second chapter of "The Hit Man Series" picks up several months after the first. "The Kidnapping" finds Andrew reprising his role as the nameless hit man from "The Cover-Up." In this second chapter, it's not so easy for the hit man, as he has to face an ambitious cop named Peter Heading.

title: Convergence
description: Nathan Davis is on a revenge path to discover who murdered his wife.

title: Nighttime
description: A girl dealing with a post-traumatic experience during the hours before sunrise.

title: Beautiful Dreamer
description: Elaine is a woman who has bad luck with men. On this day, she was fired. Her lover (the man who fired her) ended their relationship and she is in a bad mood. While she is sleeping, another man invades her life. A burglar! The intentions of this man is to get money as he is in desperation. While the burglar displays a sense of menace, as he nears the sleeping Elaine he has it in his power to use violence and menace to get his way but he doesn't. Elaine is a heavy sleeper and this disrupts his plans for a hit and run and get all the money he can. A move in-the-moment from Elaine while she is still sleeping and delirious changes the vantage point from burglar to victim and Elaine must make a choice what to do with this man. It's too bad she's still in a bad mood and men aren't high on her list!!

title: Die Pig Die!
description: A short film shot in the style of 1950s b-movies. The film was shot in my garage with forced perspective sets and green screen. The film is a dark comedy about a woman with a split personality dealing with daily harassment by men by acting out fantasies of killing pig-monster men.

title: Evidence of the Sasquatch
description: Four filmmakers embark on a location scout deep in to the Pacific Northwest wilderness, while documenting their progress they capture evidence of a deadly forest creature.

title: Tech Support
description: Jeff Howell, recent college graduate, spends his free time voyeuring customers private video accounts from his new job as a cellular communications agent. His career as a TECH SUPPORT agent is brought to an end when he crosses paths with the wrong client.

title: A Good Day
description: Thomas can't keep his mouth shut when confronted by his 'mafioso' client who demands his money. Well things don't turn out well for either of them on this Good Day.

title: Echoes
description: Dave Hidie is a troubled man. Seeking closure and peace of mind following the trauma of family bereavement, he and his wife have tried to move on. New home, new job, new friends. Everything should be coming together - if not for the visions, the voices...and the feeling that someone, somewhere, is trying to tell Dave something...something that will have shatteringly life changing effect. Dave is is experiencing the echoes of something deep and dark that should, perhaps, be left well alone.

title: Johnny Reaper
description: On John's first day of a new job, anything that can go wrong, does go wrong.

title: Le contrat
description: Two police officers are in infiltration. One night, they receive a emergency call where he had shooting near a street gang headquarter.

title: The Inherent Likeness
description: Each friend has unique and varied religious beliefs, which has made it difficult for these friends who now work together. What happens when some believe money is the root of all evil and others who believe it is all that matters?

title: Amado
description: Amado runs a cyber café in a dangerous neighborhood. An old acquaintance brings back his criminal past and Amado seeks redemption from the lifestyle he once had.

title: Variable Inconstante
description: David Freytes's first work at age 23, a low budget short film directed, written and casted by David Freytes; conceived fully by David Freytes and Gonzalo Castillo in the year of 2011. Guy (David Freytes) submerges us in a tormented climate, giving us a tour around those corners of life during which reality's perspective distorts itself to show a world at the mercy of human being's greatest tensions.
