Different faces of reality are expressed through the viewer's mind who plays the game we're all in. What are we? But an unconstant variable.

title: Chalkboard
description: A young couple is dealing with aliens and agoraphobia. Will it get the best of them. Find out in "Chalkboard."

title: På Bunden
description: A late evening, Nikoline is on her way home all alone and pregnant. She is waiting for the train to arrive but suddenly a mysterious and soaked man shows up at the train station. He traces her the whole night and no matter how hard Nikoline tries, she can't escape the presence of the man. Nikoline realizes it is her own father who drowned when she was a little girl. He has returned to bring back her baby with him.

title: Amanda Laru
description: A psychiatric patient's attempt to reintegrate herself into society, leads to her winning a role in a film. She soon finds herself in an unexpected tryst with the director, which triggers her mentally incarcerated boyfriend to escape, stalk her, and re-adopt his murderous ways.

title: Broken Spirits
description: A High School teacher with a complex past faces a battle of wills with a disruptive student in a thrilling and psychologically haunting tale. The confrontation becomes a matter of life and death.

title: Lights
description: Lights follows the story of Jobe after mysterious lights appear around the world and cause millions to disappear. Lights focuses on the relationships and the struggles of the characters surviving in this post-apocalyptic world.

title: Chain of Fools
description: Vera has killed a man. She accepts help from a gangster, Comerford, in disposing of the body. Now she is in his debt, and he wants to play a deadly game. Many people owe Mr. Comerford, and he's not interested in money. Instead, he gives them tasks, which tend to turn these people against each other, and then he sits back and watches the drama unfold. But Vera won't play...at least, not by his rules. This time, Comerford might just have met his match.

title: Mind
description: A woman, whose desires have taken over her mind, breaks into a house one evening in order to eliminate the only person who stands between her and the woman she lusts after. What does one have left to live for when the darkest recesses of their mind dictates all their actions?

title: In Black
description: In Black tells the story of Thomas Veil who has experienced a loss in life a few months before the events of the film take place. Tom's grip on reality and his trust in those around him are slipping away. On top of all of this, Tom is convinced that a man in dark clothing has been visiting him, but Tom can't tell if this figure is real or just fantasy. The one thing that is for certain is that Thomas Veil is about to react to all of these factors and find out the truth in the next 48 hours.

title: I Burn My Shadow
description: A failed writer searches for meaning in his life, he encounters a shady character the 'Con Artist' who takes him down a twisting path of betrayal and will lead the writer to a horrifying revelation.

title: The Closet
description: A little girl keeps hearing something in the closet - what could it be?

title: Rothenberg
description: Left for a hiking week-end to practice geocaching, a sort of modern treasure hunt, four friends find themselves trapped in an old bunker. They are alone in an abandoned area. In a heavy atmosphere, they realize they face strange and frightening phenomena ...

title: Graupel Poetry
description: The inseparable brothers Leung and Ming came to the big city pursuing their dreams of being successful actors. Unusual intimacy emerged in their daily life. When the taboo was broken, Leung realized that he was just living underneath the shadow of his brother. Standing on the edge of moral boundaries, Leung tried to pull himself out from the reality, but his world had already fallen apart.

title: Snare
description: When a troubled ex-convict drops out of society and heads for the bush to find solace with nature, he teams up with a renegade poacher and an independent eco-warrior woman to bring a pair of corrupt game farm owners and the head of a Rhino killing syndicate to justice.

title: How to Kill an Alias
description: Four screenwriters discover that their story ideas have all been developed into major motion pictures. They aim to find out who's been stealing their ideas and put a stop to it.

title: A Dark Room
description: A failing photographer, Arthur, relives his life through the photographs he has collected. All is not as it seems as he fights with his own memories to uncover the true events surrounding his relationship with his partner, Lauren.
